description: Add or remove a host from the C(known_hosts) file

state.description: I(present) to add the host key, I(absent) to remove it.

hash_host.description: Hash the hostname in the known_hosts file

name.description: The host to add or remove (must match a host specified in key)

key.description: The SSH public host key, as a string (required if state=present, optional when state=absent, in which case all keys for the host are removed). The key must be in the right format for ssh (see sshd(1), section "SSH_KNOWN_HOSTS FILE FORMAT")
